text: Ángel López Vázquez (born 16 January 1992 in Madrid) is a Spanish rugby sevens player. He competed for at the 2016 Summer Olympics. He also was part of the team that won the 2016 Men's Rugby Sevens Final Olympic Qualification Tournament. He debuted for in a match against in 2012. He has completed his studies in Medicine and currently works as an ophthalmologist at Hospital Ramón y Cajal in Madrid. == References == ==External links== * * Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Rugby sevens players at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic rugby sevens players of Spain Category:Spain international rugby sevens players Category:Sportspeople from Madrid
title: Ángel López (rugby union)
